XXL.Chess.physics

Class Vector2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • XXL.Chess.physics.Vector2D

  • public class Vector2D
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing a 2D vector with x and y components.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Vector2D(float x, float y)
      Constructs a Vector2D object with specified x and y components.

    • Method Summary

      Retrieves the y component of the vector.

      Checks if this vector is equal to another vector.

      Sets the x component of the vector.

      Sets the y component of the vector.

      • isEqual

        public boolean isEqual(Vector2D coord)
        Checks if this vector is equal to another vector.
        Parameters:
        coord - The Vector2D object to compare with
        Returns:
        true if the vectors have the same x and y components, false otherwise
